preferences.name: openConsole

preferences.description: Open the Hammerspoon Console after reloading the configuration file

commands.name: open-console
commands.title: Open Console
commands.description: Opens the Hammerspoon Console window and focuses it

commands.name: open-preferences
commands.title: Open Preferences
commands.description: Displays the Hammerspoon Preferences panel and focuses it

commands.name: open-documentation
commands.title: Open Documentation
commands.description: Displays the Hammerspoon documentation panel and focuses it

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
